title: VerusCommunity
author: VerusCommunity
content: Attention all crypto enthusiasts! Verus is shaking up the industry with its groundbreaking PBaaS upgrade, and you won't want to miss out. Discover how Verus is redefining decentralization, scalability, and cross-chain capabilities. Engage in the conversation, share your thoughts, and be part of the revolution. Click now to unlock the future of crypto with Verus!We have some exciting news to share with you from Verus, the cutting-edge Layer 0/1 protocol that is reshaping the landscape of blockchain technology.On May 21st, Verus will be launching its highly anticipated mainnet upgrade called Public-Blockchains-as-a-Service (PBaaS). This milestone event is set to transform the Verus community and the entire cryptocurrency industry. PBaaS introduces a comprehensive solution for true decentralization in cross-chain functionality, DeFi Automated Market Makers (AMMs), on-chain peer-to-peer exchange, self-sovereign provable recoverable IDs, NFT capabilities, anti-phishing measures, anti-MEV (Miner Extractable Value) defenses, scalability, and much more.One of the most exciting features of the PBaaS upgrade is the enhanced capabilities of VerusIDs. Every VerusID on the PBaaS network gains access to an unlimited, rent-free indexed database. This means that VerusIDs can now store and retrieve data for various applications such as social networking, voting systems, oracles, publishing information, provable attestations, ratings, and so much more. The possibilities are endless!We firmly believe that Verus PBaaS provides the most scalable, permissionless, and provable source of human data for artificial intelligence (AI) to learn about humanity and the world. We are thrilled to witness how entrepreneurs like you will leverage VerusIDs to build faster, more secure, and innovative games and services.The core capabilities of the PBaaS release include:Verus Intersystem Protocol (VIP) ‚Äî A Layer 0 Multichain and Inter-chain Protocol.VerusID Content Multimaps ‚Äî Empowering VerusIDs with unlimited provable data storage.Permissionless Chain, Token, and Liquidity Basket Currency Launches ‚Äî Offering the flexibility for developers to create their own chains, tokens, and liquidity baskets.For more detailed information, you can refer to the release notes on our GitHub page for both the Command Line Interface (CLI) and the Graphical User Interface (GUI).We firmly believe that this protocol unlocks a plethora of new opportunities and use cases for the gaming and cryptocurrency industries. We are eager to witness the groundbreaking innovations that will emerge from this technological leap.

Also, how does Verus PBaaS compare to other blockchain technologies in terms of transaction fees during periods of high network activity, such as during airdrops or ICOs?The network is actually extremely easy and simple to use, you can launch your own cocanour blockchain without any token or blockchain or even your own liquidity pool and so much more without any coding at all. Verus is a 50% proof of work and 50% proof of stake blockchain. Attack ResistantTo successfully attack the Verus blockchain, more than 50% of the validation power is needed, called Chain Power. A 51% attack would require a combined value of over 50% of both the chain‚Äôs hashpower and its coin supply. For technical information on VerusPoP read the whitepaper (opens new window).VerusPoP provides a decentralizing effect on the network, incentivizing holders to keep nodes online to support the network. Even if a change in network hashrate happens, the PoW/PoS ratio stays the same: 50/50% READ MORE: https://docs.verus.io/overview/verus-proof-of-power.html------------------------------------------NO company:Verus is a decentralized public blockchain, a community driven project in the true spirit of Bitcoin. Anyone can participate and contribute, no matter who you are or where you come from.Fair LaunchVerus had a fair launch, meaning that everyone had, and still has equal opportunity to collect its currency through mining and staking. For Verus this means:No ICO has been heldNo founder or developer feesNo premineNo commercial interestsNo rent-seeking behavior--------------------------------------Transaction fees and high-volume is not a problem Verus is a fractal blockchain. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CkgUVjx_g1M
